body: So I was banned on TS because I was banned in game. And I recall I think it was Merlin that the rules was dropped so what's the dealeo?
body_tagged: So I was banned on TS because I was banned in game. And I recall I think it was Merlin that the rules was dropped so what's the dealeo?
title: TS Rule/Still In Place

replies.body: Sorry to bump this but I want a mod to answer the question for me
replies.body_tagged: Sorry to bump this but I want a mod to answer the question for me

replies.body: If you are perm banned on the server then you will be be banned of the TeamSpeak server as well, but if your punishment is only temporary then you'll be allowed to use the TeamSpeak server.
replies.body_tagged: If you are perm banned on the server then you will be be banned of the TeamSpeak server as well, but if your punishment is only temporary then you'll be allowed to use the TeamSpeak server.

replies.body: Hmmm, this rule isnt enforced anymore.
replies.body_tagged: Hmmm, this rule isnt enforced anymore.

replies.body: Yes! An admin/sr mod get an official answer in this topic. Rese told me it's not allowed and some others mods say it's not enforced anymore. SPEAK TO ME!
replies.body_tagged: Yes! An admin/sr mod get an official answer in this topic. Rese told me it's not allowed and some others mods say it's not enforced anymore. SPEAK TO ME!

replies.body:
If you are permanently banned ingame, you'll get banned permanently on the TS aswell.
And as Aura said temporary bans are fine.
replies.body_tagged:
If you are permanently banned ingame, you'll get banned permanently on the TS aswell.
And as Aura said temporary bans are fine.

replies.body: Not forums because how are you going to appeal other than using the support email.
